name: Joy Bug
description:
Joy's friends have moved away.  It's time for Joy to go out, and make new friends!

Gameplay:
This is a platformer you play with just one button, and no arrow keys. It'll make sense once you start playing, maybe.

Created by 
Warwick Urquhart
@WoricThings
